sentences.sentence: You're looking rubicund, George Lidwell said.
sentences.translation: “你看上去红光满面，”乔治·利德·维尔说。

sentences.sentence: Shoe of small crew cut, grey dacron drill, round day, black in rubicund face bestrewed furrow, person of 58 years old has 779 years old however it seems that.
sentences.translation: 小平头、灰涤卡、圆日鞋，黑里透红的脸庞布满了皱纹，58岁的人看起来却有七八十岁。

sentences.sentence: It has many of the same nutrients of the rubicund liquid we love to consume (iron, protein, electrolytes, and caffeine) and has a delectable fruit punch flavor.
sentences.translation: 这种红色液体不仅含有我们喜欢享用的营养素(如铁、蛋白质、电解质和咖啡因)，还具有一种怡人的水果鸡尾酒风味。
